name: Interface DSAPublicKey
text:
The interface to a DSA public key. DSA (Digital Signature Algorithm)
 is defined in NIST's FIPS-186.
codes:
public interface DSAPublicKey
extends DSAKey, PublicKey

fields.description:
The class fingerprint that is set to indicate
 serialization compatibility with a previous
 version of the class.

methods.description: Returns the value of the public key, y.
